description: A little book for little readers.  The colorful cartoon characters and sweet stories contained herein belong to a different time, before the sky grew dark and the aliens arrived.
Current events concerning a bunch of people who're all dead now - or working for them.

While this seems like it would be at least partially useful in this situation, the sheer amount of speculative fiction present makes it practically useless.  What the hell is a mi-go?  Aren't triffids from some ancient movie?
Current events concerning a bunch of people who're all dead now - or working for them.
